label: 御所
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: 1. Imperial Palace Where the Sovereign (Tennō) lived when outside the regular Imperial Palace (Dairi). 2. Imperial Residence- Where the Ex-Sovereign (In), or some other member of the Imperial Family lived. [天皇、内裏、院]
